title: LFM - Team Recruiting Top/Jungle
body:
This is a reasonably serious team expecting to make gold+ easily.
Looking for people gold+ or with specific reasoning as to why they are not such as the inability to play ranked.
Add me ingame or reply to this post and we will see if you are suitable.
Warning, I have a stupidly spelled name from a long time ago so if you are going to add just copy paste.
If you are going to post a response on here could you do it in this format:
Ingame name: <<Your Ingame Name>>
Role: <<Your Role>>
Current Rank: <<Your Current Rank>>
Verbal Communication: <<Skype/TeamSpeak/Dolby Axon/None>> (write all you have)
Thanks for your time.

EDIT: initial tryouts are over but if you wish to tryout you still can

replies.body:
Batsii

Top Laner - Can play every toplaner, rarely lose top when i put my tryhard pants on 

Plat v - back from break Climbing abain

TS Skype

Hi Batsii,
I accepted your friend request on league and we look forward to trying you out.
Thanks

Ingame name: Kirisuna

Please add me on league - I sent a friend request.
Thanks

EDIT: apologies I had sent the friend request to someone without a 0 in their name, you should have the friend request now

Please add me on league - I sent a friend request.
